Posts.Content: Hi  I was supposed to go in last Thursday for a breast reduction and got a call 1pm the day before to say they had an emergency, I have been told it will be 31st Aug, still waiting for a letter, it is disappointing but as you say, some people are just newly diagnosed, at least i can wait, they told me I won't have to have the pre op assessment again as it's within 3 months, hope all goes well
Posts.Title: Cancelled surgery

Posts.Content: Hi I had dry eyes before treatment and it got worse, I used hot flannel on my eyes and used a cotton bud with warm water and a dip of baby shampoo just to clean around the eye and it worked for me,  Hope this helps
Posts.Title: awful dry sore eyes
